metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Docks roadOne of several dock delivery workers - NOTE Please rename to Felgi Diggums.

0.speaker: Felgi Diggums
0.text: Looks like the big metal bruiser has gone on permanent break. Maybe the Fists are next.

1.speaker: Felgi Diggums
1.text: Even before they got those big metal bruisers, the Fists were obnoxious, but now...
